summary: broken promises | Steve Rogers x Male!Reader
title: broken promises | Steve Rogers x Male!Reader
body:
General information:

Steve Rogers (Captain America) x Male!Reader

warning(s): ANGST! mentions of drugs & alcohol
reader info: the reader will go by he/him/his pronouns.
word count: 497
other info: this work does not follow any plot or the movies, but it exists in the same universe. please note that this is also posted on my quotev and tumblr. this is not beta read, so please excuse me if you see any mistakes.  **NOT MY GIF

-

“No, Steve!” You raised your voice to a high pitch tone, and Steve couldn’t help but widen his eyes. You never raised your voice. Never.

“You… you don’t,” you continued in the same high pitch voice, but in a lower voice again. Steve could practically feel his heart making itself ready to leap out of his chest to crash onto the floor and explode in a million pieces. The feel and thought alone that his heart was preparing itself to be broken was scary and painful enough on its own.

“You don’t understand.” You looked so desperate for Steve to understand yet so dejected over the fact that he didn’t understand.

How could the Captain America possibly imagine what you were going through? He could never fill your shoes, even if he sincerely wished to.

“I don’t understand what, [Nickname]?” He asked feeling his own voice crack like yours.

You weren’t being fair.

This wasn’t how it was supposed to be.

This was not how he planned their evening to go and this was not the outcome he hoped for.

“You don’t understand…” You repeated casting your eyes downwards, refusing to look Steve in the eye. If you were to meet his blue ones, even for just a second, you knew you could never leave.

Steve felt so confused and betrayed at the same time, this was a completely new side to you and did not like it at all. How could he have missed all the signs?

“But why him?” He felt himself whisper harshly, swallowing hard trying to get rid of that horrible dry and heavy feeling that always came before hot tears streamed down his cheeks.

He saw you squirming and turning your head even more away from him. What did he do to deserve your rejection and why couldn’t you just see, see that he… that he, no.

He saw your lips move as if they spoke a thousand words, but no sound reached his ears. He wanted to understand so badly, he wanted to be there and hold the broken boy in front of him. Why couldn’t you understand? No, why didn’t you let him understand?

“Because,” A broken sob escaped your lips as you let all of the pain wash over you, not being able to keep the emotions at bay anymore. “Because he doesn’t care, and he helps me by taking the pain away.”

Steve stared at the now crying male, clenching his fists so he wouldn’t reach out to touch and drag you into his arms forever.

“With drugs [Male Name], and with alcohol…” He whispered in the same broken tone, refusing to let the first tear fall.

“You promised.” It was no use, the tear, and many more ran down his flushed cheeks.

“Why can’t you see,”

But the last words fell upon deaf ears as you stormed out, letting each painful sob you emitted break Steve’s heart into a thousand pieces inside his chest.

“I love you.”

summary: Justify My Love
title: Justify My Love
body:
​Imagine, the Grandmaster’s idea of doing you an honor is to have you and Loki provide the erotic entertainment at his next party.

Justify My Love

I want to run naked in a rainstormMake love in a train cross-countryYou put this in meSo now what, so now what?“This is insane!” You muttered, totally mortified. You’ve been pacing in your room…

Read more…

summary: Sooo, Strange still had the time stone when they were fighting Thanos on his planet. According to what he told Tony, he was...
body: Sooo, Strange still had the time stone when they were fighting Thanos on his planet. According to what he told Tony, he was aiming for the right events to happen so that they could get that one victory. So he probably went back in time again and again off screen till they got the right result??

blog.name: lokis-smile
blog.title: #TeamIrondad
blog.description: loki, peter parker and bucky barnes enthusiast ▪ main blog: @satirical-sagas ▪I take requests!! (reader-centric or non shippy content)

summary:
Headcanon where everyone is together, alive and happy (Post Civil War)
Bet Peter (Parker) remembers fighting Bucky from Civil...
body:
Headcanon where everyone is together, alive and happy (Post Civil War)

Bet Peter (Parker) remembers fighting Bucky from Civil War but then later they meet up again and Bucky’s all like “oh no oh crap I nearly killed this kid okay Bucky apologize nice and slowly and if he cries just back off holy SHIT HE’S COMING CLOSER” and Peter is just kinda like. “Oh hey! I’ve heard about you from the museums and stuff. You were friends with Mr. Rogers, right? How was he like back then?” and he’s just so chill and it throws Bucky off-guard.

Like,, he could’ve killed or severely injured this kid and there’s no tension whatsoever from Peter. Peter remembers Bucky but he doesn’t hold a grudge because Peter knew the consequences of the battle and he’s heard briefly what Bucky went through so he’s just relaxed.

And then Peter is the one to show Bucky memes, dad jokes and vines and that’s how Bucky becomes one of Peter’s Dads™️.

blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

summary: Ghosts of the memories
title: Ghosts of the memories
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2N295Je

by WinterMorningFrost

When Toni quits the avengers after a fight with Steve, a certain (hot) Norse God visits the remaining Avengers. Together the Avengers (and Loki) watch Toni’s childhood experiences and her becoming of IronWoman. (aka they watch her childhood memories)

Words: 1020, Chapters: 1/9, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/F
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Tony Stark, Bruce Banner, Thor (Marvel), Loki (Marvel), Pepper Potts, Howard Stark, Peggy Carter, Maria Stark
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov
  • Additional Tags: Fem!Tony, loki is a small sad boy, character called toni, toni also small sad girl, not exactly a serious story, but kinda, Angst, Blackmail, Childhood Memories, How Do I Tag, Hurt/Comfort, Friendship, ending kinda leads on to other movies, Not really though, Memories, Post-Avengers (2012), Abusive Parents, Howard is a dick, Non-Graphic Violence, References to Depression, will tag as I go, Implied Sexual Content, Kinda Crack, Post-Thor: The Dark World, Post-Iron Man 3, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Pre-Captain America: The Winter Soldier


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2N295Je

summary: Hold Me (Loki x Reader)
body:
Hold Me (Loki x Reader)

Requested by: @lykaonimagines

Hey! :) Sorry for the late reply I just got home from work. Congrats! :) And Loki . is my love and I live for angst turned fluffy :P lol So I’d say anything you came up with that was angsty with some fluff would be amazing ^_^

Word count: 802 words

Warning/s: Bad writing

A/N: This is a special story for @lykaonimagines for being and amazing person, I also added a little bit at the end that doesn’t make sense 😂

Feedback and reblogging always helps🖤

Thanks again for 100 followers!

The dripping of water and the crawling of rats echoed through your cell as you leaned against the wall, counting the amount of spiders on the roof. Dark circles surrounded your eyes and red scratches had found themselves on your now sunken cheeks.

Odin had thrown you in here after the battle in New York, you knew now what you did was wrong, you just wished you knew that before you killed all those innocent people. You were just to blinded by your love for Loki, and you hated him for that. But still you mourned when you had found out he died. After he had died Thor offered to let you out of this dreadful place, but you knew you had no reason to now Loki was gone. Your plan now was to rot and that’s what you were doing.

You continued to count the spiders as footsteps made themselves down to your dungeons, you ignored them thinking it was one of the guards or even Odin coming to make “conversation.”

“You’ve truly let yourself go,” a voice rang after footsteps came to a halt.

“Odin,” you rolled your eyes as you stood up.

“Thank you for blessing me with your presence, but now may I kindly ask you to leave.”

“Now that isn’t how you should talk to your king.” He mocked as you walked towards the cell bars.

“After all you’ve done, you’re no king to me,” you growled now clutching the bars in front of you.

“Well your right about that one,” Odin smirked.

“Wha-,” you started before being cut off by a bright light.

“Because I’m a prince,” a familiar voice emerged from the light.

You froze at the sight before you, a mixture of emotions made it’s way to both your face and mind. You didn’t know what to do, yell at him or jump into his arms, kiss him or punch him in the mouth. You were just completely and utterly baffled.

“Yes I know,” he said putting his arms up and walking towards you. “You must be really happy to see me,” he smirked waving his hand in the air, allowing the cell door to open.

“I’ve missed yo-.”

“You insensitive bastard!” You lashed out at him, pushing him down to the ground and holding him by the neck. “You cannot just barge in here without an explanation. How idiotic can you be?!” You fumed, slapping him after every word.

“I mourned for you,” your voice cracked as you finally started to breakdown. “And you have the nerve to barge in here without an explanation. Have you no empathy?” You cried, repeatedly slamming your fists on his chest.

“Y/N, stop,” he said calmly but you kept going.

“Y/N,” he said hesitantly as he grabbed both of your hands, keeping them in his firm grip. “Please listen to me…

I’m sorry,”

“Sorry is not going to cover it,” you growled getting off of him and backing into to cell.

“You didn’t even try to come here sooner.”

“Trust me Y/N,” he whispered. “I wish I did, but I had to wait for the right time.”

“The right time for what?”

“Taking Odin’s place,” Loki answered, morphing back into Odin.

“But, why?” You asked walking towards Loki.

“So I could could get you out of here, no questions asked.” He answered, his hand making it’s way to your cheek.

Tears started to fall from your eyes as you wrapped your arms around Loki.

“I-,”

“Shhh,” you cut him off. “Just hold me.”

“-“

You had no idea what was wrong with you, you were just so miserable and confused, and all you wanted to do was to be comforted, for once, you wanted to be held.

After Loki, well “Odin” released you from prison, all of Asgard was now under his control, and much to your distaste he started abusing his power. You did not like it of course, but throwing lavish parties every night, and making plays about the both of you(mostly him) you could tolerate, but what he did now was way out of line.

“What in the nine realms made you think this was a good idea to do this?!” You asked as pacing around Odin’s quarters.

“I though it would be a bit of fun,” Loki huffed. “And besides no one else is complaining , I didn’t know you’d overreact like this.

“I’m not overreacting Loki,” you fumed at the annoyingly good looking god. “People will find out you’re not Odin, if you keep pulling charades like this. Come on Loki, plays I can handle, but a statue, are you mad?!”

“Love, calm down,” he sighed ignoring what you just said. “I know what I did was absolutely idiotic, but you have to admit. That statue is glorious.”

“Loki!”

“Well your right about that one,” Odin smirked.

“Wha-,” you started before being cut off by a bright light.

“Because I’m a prince,” a familiar voice emerged from the light.

You froze at the sight before you, a mixture of emotions made it’s way to both your face and mind. You didn’t know what to do, yell at him or jump into his arms, kiss him or punch him in the mouth. You were just completely and utterly baffled.

“Yes I know,” he said putting his arms up and walking towards you. “You must be really happy to see me,” he smirked waving his hand in the air, allowing the cell door to open.

“I’ve missed yo-.”

“You insensitive bastard!” You lashed out at him, pushing him down to the ground and holding him by the neck. “You cannot just barge in here without an explanation. How idiotic can you be?!” You fumed, slapping him after every word.

“I mourned for you,” your voice cracked as you finally started to breakdown. “And you have the nerve to barge in here without an explanation. Have you no empathy?” You cried, repeatedly slamming your fists on his chest.

“Y/N, stop,” he said calmly but you kept going.

“Y/N,” he said hesitantly as he grabbed both of your hands, keeping them in his firm grip. “Please listen to me…

I’m sorry,”

“Sorry is not going to cover it,” you growled getting off of him and backing into to cell.

“You didn’t even try to come here sooner.”

“Trust me Y/N,” he whispered. “I wish I did, but I had to wait for the right time.”

“The right time for what?”

“Taking Odin’s place,” Loki answered, morphing back into Odin.

“But, why?” You asked walking towards Loki.

“So I could could get you out of here, no questions asked.” He answered, his hand making it’s way to your cheek.

Tears started to fall from your eyes as you wrapped your arms around Loki.

“I-,”

“Shhh,” you cut him off. “Just hold me.”

“-“

You had no idea what was wrong with you, you were just so miserable and confused, and all you wanted to do was to be comforted, for once, you wanted to be held.

After Loki, well “Odin” released you from prison, all of Asgard was now under his control, and much to your distaste he started abusing his power. You did not like it of course, but throwing lavish parties every night, and making plays about the both of you(mostly him) you could tolerate, but what he did now was way out of line.

“What in the nine realms made you think this was a good idea to do this?!” You asked as pacing around Odin’s quarters.

“I though it would be a bit of fun,” Loki huffed. “And besides no one else is complaining , I didn’t know you’d overreact like this.

“I’m not overreacting Loki,” you fumed at the annoyingly good looking god. “People will find out you’re not Odin, if you keep pulling charades like this. Come on Loki, plays I can handle, but a statue, are you mad?!”

“Love, calm down,” he sighed ignoring what you just said. “I know what I did was absolutely idiotic, but you have to admit. That statue is glorious.”

“Loki!”
